full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYI MDZES PA'I DPON MO SANGS RGYAS SGROL MA'I ZHAL 'DON DU DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,)
author_simple: DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS,
